gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.model

Class ModelTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.model.ModelTerm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstantTerm, DerivedTerm, SingleVariableTerm

    @MappedSuperclass
public abstract class ModelTerm
extends java.lang.Object

    A single summation term in a risk model.

    Presents an immutable public interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoefficient

        public float getCoefficient()
        Returns the coefficient assigned to this term.

      • getRequiredVariables

        public abstract com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<Variable> getRequiredVariables()
        Returns the required Variable(s) for the term. Unmodifiable and will not contain nulls.

      • baseEquals

        protected boolean baseEquals(ModelTerm other)
        Base equals() functionality that simply verifies equality of the coefficient.
        Parameters:
        other - must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the coefficients are equal, false otherwise

      • getSummand

        public abstract float getSummand(java.util.Map<Variable,Value> inputValues)
                          throws MissingValuesException
        Returns the value to add to the risk model sum, given a complete set of Values for the calculation.
        Parameters:
        inputValues - a map from variable to value for each value. Must contain a value for each required variable
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given collection of values does not provide a value for each required variable
        MissingValuesException - if there are any variables without assigned values
